experience: You and Chelsea both know Kimberlie Cerrone, Max Hansen, and 82 others
Thrive Global Launches Thrive Library of eCourses on LinkedIn Learning
Loving this book by Ed Catmull-Creativity Inc.

Strategic partner and catalyst for corporate-wide Human Resources operational strategies to support the organization’s mission and vision for short-term and long-term growth and sustainability in an evolving healthcare business climate. Collaborative project leadership and operational management responsibilities with full spectrum of functions and teams to identify, acquire and implement Human Resources initiatives throughout the organization. Specifically:Coaches and promotes high performance expectations for the leadership/management team consistent with enterprise guidelines of improving employee experiences, policy and program excellence and practice efficiencyDevelop and implement strategic, tactical, programmatic and operational plans/objectives utilizing forecasting and planning processes to identify revenue opportunities and investment realization.Review and implement appropriate strategies to support growth related opportunities to maximize capacity and capability of Human Resources services offered, ensuring the delivery of services that are responsive to the needs of the workforceMaintains on-going communication with system-wide Human Resources to ensure unique facility needs are considered with regard to the strategic direction of the System. Previously supported St. Joseph's Hospital and Medical center and Westgate Medical Center. Focused on the strategic partnering, employee engagement and risk management operations within the hospitals. Accountable for advising leaders and advocating for employees at St Joseph’s Hospital and Medical Center (600 bed, level one trauma medical center) in the ancillary and nursing function as well as Barrow Neurological Institute and the Grant Funding Research. Provided support to St. Joseph’s Hospital and Medical Center Westgate. Previously supported the Dignity Health Medical Group for 2 years

Lead contact for managing multiple human resources projects with competing deadlines. Developed and executed on project plan for engagement, HRIS implementation, employee support and preparations for international operations. Highlights included:Employee relations advisement and partnership with leaders and business units within the organizationImplemented HRIS system go-live to support strategic initiativesPartnered with leadership on the implementation of Strategic Alignment and Core Competencies through all functional areasPartnered with Legal to drive and ensure appropriate employment compliance measures were in place and maintainedLead human resources contact involved in the pre-planning for the International team’s expansion into India

Human Resources leader responsible for employees across the nation. Managed all aspects of the Human Resources function including recruitment, employee relations, risk, performance and training. Scope included:Managed Human Resources for Arizona, Texas, Missouri, Albuquerque and IowaSet goals and priorities for the entire Human Resources organization, identified responsibilities and developed strategic plans for the group, responsible for execution and measuring results; met all goalsBudget Management and continual program management to ensure the appropriate return on initiativesSupported 32 Firm Partners to ensure that business needs and objectives were being met through appropriate staffing, utilization and managementCreated programs that enabled Clifton Gunderson to win Best Place to Work, Work Place Excellence, Most Admired Company and the Alfred P Sloan award each year of employment

summary: I have a proven senior -level track record of strategic and operational Human Resource management, performance, expertise and knowledge that has established my legacy of positive engagement and influence with stakeholders across all levels including Executive Leaders, and multi-disciplinary roles and functions.  I am a solutions - oriented business partner who is a strong collaborator of intentional business decisions. I pride myself on being a values based, authentic leader who exemplifies doing the right thing showing compassion for just outcomes. My passion for my work is a catalyst for change; a spark that balances creativity and calculation for viable outcomes.
